item.title: MDVM Guidance for CVE-2025-53786: Exchange Hybrid Privilege Escalation
item.description:
Executive Summary Vulnerability Description CVE-2025-53786 is an Elevation of Privilege (EoP) flaw in hybrid Microsoft Exchange Server deployments. Attackers with administrative rights on an on-premises Exchange Server can exploit the shared service principal trust to gain control of the connected Exchange Online environment. Affected Products and Versions:
Microsoft Exchange Server 2016 (Hybrid deployments) Microsoft Exchange Server 2019 (Hybrid deployments)
